name: Ben 10 Omniverse: Rise of Heroes
storyline: The storyline was written by the original writers of the animated TV series, and was be set between events of Ben 10 and Ben 10: Alien Force. Players of Ben 10 Omniverse: Rise of Heroes will be asked to take on the role of one of the students at Bellwood Elementary School, “who find themselves trapped in a strange world and transformed into one of three types of alien creatures after the Omnitrix overloads. With Ben, Gwen and Grandpa Max to guide them, they face a series of challenges and adventures in a fantastic new world. But will the students be able to return to their original human forms or are they trapped forever?”
summary: Ben 10 Omniverse: Rise of Heroes was a Ben 10 online game. It was a MMORPG.
